title: Bot Information
description:
Tinker is a simple all-round helper for any server! From announcements to moderation, memes to dad jokes, music to polls, Tinker provides you with anything and everything necessary to keep your server running smoothly
This little dude has his own personality which never fails to put a smile on everyone's face!

fields.name: Updates and Information
fields.value: Tinker gets updates all the time: bug fixes, new features and prettifying to give you the best experience, and we'd love to hear how we are doing. Head to our Support Server :arrow_down: and give us some feedback. We listen to each and every request, bug report, cry for help and small annoyance because we want the best for you

fields.name: Recent Changes
fields.value:
The Information Age! Our most recent update brings to you polls! Ask yes-no, thumbs up - thumbs down or multiple choice questions.
We now also have a better error detection system, now you can bring error codes to our support server instead of trying to describe the error. This makes bug fixes and bot improvements much quicker and easier so we can bring out more updates for you!

fields.name: Developers
fields.value: Author & Lead Dev: Inanis#2432, Devs: TechnoBiscuit#3540, Dukemz#7766
